abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33244028, pmid33203503, pmid33246432, pmid32717195, pmid33202404, pmid33206679, pmid33244060, pmid33191813, pmid33245577, pmid33219449, pmid33225911, pmid33237889
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.12.02
